text:
love stripe, but you have a death spiral in your process. I tried to reactivate my account. no longer have the old domain. so I can't contact support because I can't log in. it takes WEEKS to get paid with a new account. after more than five years [on and off] with you, I would have hoped for a better process. #justSayin since you asked.
p.s. i emailed this too.
